title: Is there an 'easy' way to determine if someone has placed a GPS tracking device on my vehicle? - Quora

response.answer_text: Other than disassembling the vehicle, no. GPS is a passive protocol, receive only. The only thing you could detect is a transmitter - for example, a GPS tracker with a built-in cell phone modem. If the device is not transmitting though, there's no way to discover it.
